title: The site plan shall be submitted with an application for building permission drawn to a scale of 1:500 or more as may be decided by the Authority
clause_text: The site plan shall be submitted with an application for building permission drawn to a scale of 1:500 or more as may be decided by the Authority. This plan shall be based on the measurement plan duly authenticated by the appropriate officer of the Department of Land Records. This plan shall have the following details :- Boundaries of the site and of any contiguous land belonging to the neighbouring owners; Position of the site in relation to neighbouring streets; Name of the street, if any, from which the building is proposed to derive access;
